name: swarm
caption: Swarm

effect.short: Strengthens []{type:bug} moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} or less.
effect.full:
When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its [HP]{mechanic:hp} remaining, its []{type:bug}-type moves inflict 1.5× as much [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.

flavorText:
Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP
is low.
